LABEL: Flare
TEXT: The #yFlare effect of a card can be triggered by #bright-clicking it.
When using a controller, press #bRS (right stick) to trigger the #yFlare effect.

LABEL: SPECIAL Shop
TEXT: The items in this shop require #rMax #rHP as a cost. NL Additionally, this shop has 3 pages, and can remove cards up to 3 times.
